resources.string:
This game begins by giving you a random number between 1 and 100.
If the number is divisable by 7 and/or contains the number 7, press 'Buzz'.
If the number is divisable and/or contains thenumber 5, press 'Bizz'.
If the number is both 'Bizz' and 'Buzz', then press 'BizzBuzz'.

If you are incorrect. Game Over. Have Fun!
